title: What can I do if my phone's Wi-Fi connection automatically disconnects after the screen turns off?
answer:
Change the Wi-Fi sleep policy as follows: Touch Settings, go to the Wireless & networks > Wi-Fi. Touch Advanced settings > Keep Wi-Fi on during sleep, and select Always.

Note: By default, Always is selected for Keep Wi-Fi on during sleep. If the settings are modified, your phone disconnects from the Wi-Fi network when its screen turns off. The following describes the three options of Keep Wi-Fi on during sleep:

Always: The Wi-Fi connection never disconnects.

Only when plugged in: The Wi-Fi connection never disconnects when the phone is charging. If the phone is not charging, it disconnects a Wi-Fi connection when it has been idle for 3 minutes.

Never (increase data usage): The Wi-Fi connection disconnects when the phone has been idle for 3 minutes.
